data.description: A flavorful and protein-rich bowl featuring grilled salmon and quinoa, perfect for a balanced meal.
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, zucchini, and carrots)
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Season the salmon fillet with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat and grill the salmon for about 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through.
In the same pan, stir-fry the mixed vegetables until tender.
To assemble, place cooked quinoa in a bowl, top with grilled salmon and mixed vegetables.
Serve with fresh lemon wedges on the side.
